Dr. Strange

He Was a Top Neurosurgeon Before Becoming a Master of the Mystic Arts. Doctor Strange's origin story is a commentary on human vanity and hubris. He was a narcissist, a world-renowned neurosurgeon more concerned with his own self interests than his patients' well being.

Sorcerer Supreme
